prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：如何获得声音的空间感?

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Adobe Audition CC Classroom in a Book 2nd Edition, was published on 2018. (It can be cite this paper as ⁨Jago⁩ and ⁨Team⁩, 2018 on your answer). 
- Course - Audition essential training, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as “Course - Audition essential trai…”, 2019 on your answer). 
- Course - Practical audio techniques with audition, (It can be cite this paper as “Course - Practical audio techniq…” on your answer). 
- 中文版Adobe audition CC 2020从入门到精通, was published on 2021. (It can be cite this paper as 袁诗轩, 2021 on your answer).
response: 转眼间，你和 Kimi 的这个对话已经超过了 20 万字。Kimi 在不断提升自己对话最大长度，但现在只能麻烦你开启一个新会话。期待与你再相遇！
quection: 基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：如何获得声音的空间感?
